description:
For colder, wetter days, this full-zip jacket is designed to move with you as you paddle your board out through the fog. Keep you snacks and phone safe with the zippered pockets.

  • Polyester and Spandex face fabric is bonded to 0.5mm petroleum-free neoprene
  • Nylon and polyester lining feels nice against your skin
  • Eco-Stretch neoprene is limestone-based and designed for comfort and warmth
  • 3-panel hood has a cord lock to get the perfect fit
  • UPF 50+ protects you from UV rays
  • Flat lock stitched seams throughout
  • Seamless underarm panel with raglan sleeves for unrestricted movement
  • Zippered side pockets and chest pocket
name: Level Six Jericho Neoprene Hoody - Men's
